forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and scattered thunderstorms for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain this morning...then scattered thunderstorms in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 53F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low near 40F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 54F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 57F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 7C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
